description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. The bears are befuddled! Help these batty bears blast their way through challenges in this puzzle, arcade-shooter. Follow the bears' escapades in story mode, and play with - or against - three friends in local multi-player. Along the way, unlock a bunch of bears and weapons, each with unique strategies to master. Did we mention cookies would be involved? The bears need you - don't let them down!
